---
title: "Principal Component Analysis"
author: "Jonas J.R. Koberschinski"
date: "14-11-2024"
---

::: {.cell .hidden}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| include: false
# set working directory
setwd('/Users/kobi/Desktop/Promotionsdatananalyse mit Excel und Martin')

#data set with all CpGs in columns for EDA and PCA
library(readxl)

# load data
 ## BDNF
bdnf <- read_excel("Rohdaten/BDNF_Neuroplastizität_Alter_CpGs_ohne_m11_und_p36_mit_verhalten_vollständig.xlsx")
bdnf[1:5,]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

:::


## BDNF

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
cpg_bdnf <- bdnf[11:20]
pca_bdnf <- prcomp(na.omit(cpg_bdnf), scale = TRUE)

## plot pc1 and pc2
plot(pca_bdnf$x[,1], pca_bdnf$x[,2])
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Principal-Component-Analysis_141124_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
## make a scree plot
pca_bdnf_var <- pca_bdnf$sdev^2
pca_bdnf_var_per <- round(pca_bdnf_var/sum(pca_bdnf_var)*100, 1)

barplot(pca_bdnf_var_per, main="BDNF Scree Plot", xlab="Principal Component", ylab="Percent Variation")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Principal-Component-Analysis_141124_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
## now make a fancy looking plot that shows the PCs and the variation:
library(ggplot2)


pca_bdnf_data <- as.data.frame(pca_bdnf$x)
pca_bdnf_data$ID <- rownames(pca_bdnf)

str(pca_bdnf_data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
'data.frame':	346 obs. of  10 variables:
 $ PC1 : num  -0.498 1.172 -2.035 0.942 -0.244 ...
 $ PC2 : num  -0.0963 0.1816 2.3084 -0.1145 -0.4425 ...
 $ PC3 : num  0.529 0.438 -1.41 -0.314 -1.196 ...
 $ PC4 : num  -0.09503 -0.38193 -0.36238 0.21739 0.00517 ...
 $ PC5 : num  0.7161 0.0675 -0.0465 -1.5852 -0.5034 ...
 $ PC6 : num  0.0569 -0.0588 -1.3706 -0.6716 0.0752 ...
 $ PC7 : num  -0.158 0.3012 -0.0571 -0.2341 -0.3083 ...
 $ PC8 : num  -0.9687 -0.0933 -0.4444 1.1052 0.6529 ...
 $ PC9 : num  -0.732 -0.044 -1.232 -0.507 0.472 ...
 $ PC10: num  0.683 0.32 -1.476 0.869 -0.34 ...
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
ggplot(pca_bdnf_data, aes(PC1, PC2)) +
  geom_point() +
  xlab(paste("PC1 - ", pca_bdnf_var_per[1], "%", sep="")) +
  ylab(paste("PC2 - ", pca_bdnf_var_per[2], "%", sep="")) +
  theme_bw() +
  ggtitle("BDNF PCA Graph")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Principal-Component-Analysis_141124_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
bdnf_loading_scores <- pca_bdnf$rotation[,1]
bdnf_methylation_scores <- abs(bdnf_loading_scores) # what to do of bdnf_methylation_scores?
  
library(ggfortify)
pca_bdnf_res <- prcomp(na.omit(bdnf[c(11:20)]), scale = TRUE)

autoplot(pca_bdnf_res, data = na.omit(bdnf[c(1:20)]), colour = 'Zeitpunkt',
         loadings = TRUE, loadings.colour = 'blue',
         loadings.label = TRUE, loadings.label.size = 3)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Principal-Component-Analysis_141124_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
autoplot(pca_bdnf_res, data = na.omit(bdnf[c(1:20)]), colour = 'Gruppe', 
         loadings = TRUE, loadings.colour = 'blue',
         loadings.label = TRUE, loadings.label.size = 3)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Principal-Component-Analysis_141124_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-5.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
autoplot(pca_bdnf_res, data = na.omit(bdnf[c(1:22)]), colour = 'Sex', 
         loadings = TRUE, loadings.colour = 'blue',
         loadings.label = TRUE, loadings.label.size = 3)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Principal-Component-Analysis_141124_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-6.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## Tau

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
cpg_tau <- tau[c(9:57)]
pca_tau <- prcomp(na.omit(cpg_tau), scale = TRUE)

## plot pc1 and pc2
plot(pca_tau$x[,1], pca_tau$x[,2])
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Principal-Component-Analysis_141124_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
## make a scree plot
pca_tau_var <- pca_tau$sdev^2
pca_tau_var_per <- round(pca_tau_var/sum(pca_tau_var)*100, 1)

barplot(pca_tau_var_per, main="Tau Scree Plot", xlab="Principal Component", ylab="Percent Variation")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Principal-Component-Analysis_141124_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
## now make a fancy looking plot that shows the PCs and the variation:
library(ggplot2)


pca_tau_data <- as.data.frame(pca_tau$x)
pca_tau_data$ID <- rownames(pca_tau)

str(pca_tau_data)
```

tau_methylation_scores <- abs(tau_loading_scores) # what to do of tau_methylation_scores?

         loadings = TRUE, loadings.colour = 'blue',
         loadings.label = TRUE, loadings.label.size = 3)

## PSD95

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
cpg_psd95 <- psd95[10:54]
pca_psd95 <- prcomp(na.omit(cpg_psd95), scale = TRUE)

## plot pc1 and pc2
plot(pca_psd95$x[,1], pca_psd95$x[,2])
```

:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
## make a scree plot
pca_psd95_var <- pca_psd95$sdev^2
pca_psd95_var_per <- round(pca_psd95_var/sum(pca_psd95_var)*100, 1)

barplot(pca_psd95_var_per, main="PSD95 Scree Plot", xlab="Principal Component", ylab="Percent Variation")
```

![](Principal-Component-Analysis_141124_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-2.png){width=672}

autoplot(pca_psd95_res, data = na.omit(psd95[c(1:54)]), colour = 'Zeitpunkt',
         loadings = TRUE, loadings.colour = 'blue',

         loadings.label = TRUE, loadings.label.size = 3)
